https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/r9P3JkYDx0t67xZUf3Y7nxdoHN0.jpg On Good Friday in Burzet, a small town in Ardeche, the locals gather to remember Jesus's Crucifixion through solemn pageantry. Between 1980 and 2003, Courant filmed this community's annual reenactment of the Via Crucis 24 times. 24 Passions
